summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2932, for the improvement of East Valley Street, from 34th Avenue North to 36th Avenue North , and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by construction of concrete sidewalks, combined concrete curbs and gutters; and by paving the same with asphalt and with asphaltic concrete, under Ordinance No. 35387 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
